channel.title: Need help Editing/Change items Price in "Matrix 718"
channel.description:
Q.1: How i can change items price's in Matrix 718? Q.2: How i can make Spawning to Admin only?
Skype: Evil.Wrecked (Add me if you can help me or leave your Skype name in Replies) ---------------------- Thank you... Taylor.

item.title: Need help Editing/Change items Price in "Matrix 718"
item.dc:creator: @torvakillers torvakillers
item.description:
@torvakillers wrote:

[quote=“Sir wootness, post:2, topic:461080”]For shop prices go to data/items and find unpackedshops.txt and the prices and amount of items in shop are there to edit there is a legend/key at the top that shows you the format in which its done.

If your talking about spawning items only for admin that’s easy just go to the command and after

case “yell”:

put
if (player.rights >= 2) {

and after the rest of the command but beforethe return true; put a }

then go into player.java and find private int rights; and make it public int rights;
compile and save then only people that have the rights 2 and above can use that command.[/quote]

what about unpacked shops for adding items o shop not editing prices?!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Editing/Change items Price in "Matrix 718"

item.title: Need help Editing/Change items Price in "Matrix 718"
item.dc:creator: @Sir_wootness Sir wootness
item.description:
@Sir_wootness wrote:

For shop prices go to data/items and find unpackedshops.txt and the prices and amount of items in shop are there to edit there is a legend/key at the top that shows you the format in which its done.

If your talking about spawning items only for admin that’s easy just go to the command and after

case “yell”:

put
if (player.rights >= 2) {

and after the rest of the command but beforethe return true; put a }

then go into player.java and find private int rights; and make it public int rights;
compile and save then only people that have the rights 2 and above can use that command.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Editing/Change items Price in "Matrix 718"
